overview: Navy ensign Nellie Forbush and Marine lieutenant Joseph Cable find love and confront bigotry (including their own prejudices) while stationed in the South Pacific during World War II. Filmed version of the 2008 Broadway revival featuring the original cast.  Original broadcast on the PBS series "Live From Lincoln Center" (season 35, episode 3).

production_companies.name: Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts

title: South Pacific
